services.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
services.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your organization's needs
services.freeToolDesc: For individual researchers and small teams
services.validationReportsDesc: For compliance teams and QA departments
services.fullMappingSupportDesc: For enterprises and clinical trial sponsors
services.canUpgradeAnytime: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
services.canUpgradeAnyTimeAnswer: Yes, you can change your plan anytime. Changes take effect immediately and we'll prorate your billing.
services.isThereTrial: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
services.isThereTrialAnswer: We offer a 14-day free trial for Validation Reports and Full Mapping Support. No credit card required.
services.whatAboutSecurityAnswer: All plans include local browser processing and zero server storage. Your data never leaves your device.
services.customEnterprise: Do you offer custom enterprise plans?
services.customEnterpriseAnswer: Yes! Contact our sales team for custom pricing and dedicated support tailored to your organization.
services.readyToGetStartedDesc: Start with our free tool, or contact us to learn more about our enterprise solutions.

security.title: Security First
security.subtitle: Your clinical trial data stays completely in your control. No uploads. No servers. No risk.
security.localBrowserProcessingDesc: All processing happens on your device
security.localBrowserProcessingContent: HandyCT runs entirely in your browser. Your CSV files are processed locally on your computer and never transmitted to any server.
security.noNetworkTransmission: No sensitive data transmitted over the network
security.zeroServerStorageDesc: Your data never touches our servers
security.zeroServerStorageContent: We don't store, cache, or log any of your clinical trial data. Every conversion is temporary and deleted immediately after download.
security.noAuditLogs: No audit logs of your data
security.compliantWithGDPR: Compliant with GDPR, HIPAA, and FDA regulations
security.fdaCompliantDesc: Follows FDA guidance on SDTM and ADaM data standards. Your converted data meets regulatory requirements.
security.cdiscDesc: Implements CDISC SDTM, ADaM, and Define-XML standards. Ensures data consistency across your organization.
security.dataPrivacyDesc: Zero personal data collection. No tracking. No third-party integrations. Privacy by design.
security.readyToConvert: Ready to convert your data securely?

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your clinical trial data conversion needs
contact.inquiryFormDesc: Help us understand your requirements so we can provide the best solution
contact.privacyNote: We respect your privacy. Your information will only be used to contact you about your inquiry.
contact.inquiryReceived: Your inquiry has been received. Our compliance expert will contact you within 24 hours.
contact.lookingForward: We look forward to helping you streamline your CDISC data conversion process.
